    • Uses of SystemShutdownException in businessLogic

      Methods in businessLogic that throw SystemShutdownException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminFacade.createCompany(Company company)
      Insert company to the table Company - Can't insert company if the name exists
      - Can't insert company if the system shut down
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Insert coupon to the table Coupon and insert the id of the company who created this coupon and the id of this coupon to the table Company_Coupon - Can't insert coupon if the title exists
      - Can't insert coupon if the system shut down
      void AdminFacade.createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Insert customer to the table Customer - Can't insert customer if the name exists
      - Can't insert customer if the system shut down
      java.util.ArrayList<Company> AdminFacade.getAllCompnies()
      Get all companies from the table Company and the valid coupons of any company from the tables Company_Coupon, Coupon - Can't get all companies if the system shut down
      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getAllCoupons()
      Get the valid coupons of the current company from the tables Company_Coupon, Coupon - Can't get the coupons if the system shut down
      java.util.ArrayList<Customer> AdminFacade.getAllCustomers()
      Get all customers from the table Customer and the coupons of any customer from the tables Customer_Coupon, Coupon - Can't get all customers if the system shut down
      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllPurchasedCoupons()
      Get the coupons of the current customer from the tables Customer_Coupon, Coupon - Can't get purchased coupons if the system shut down
      Company AdminFacade.getCompany(long id)
      Get company from the table Company and the valid coupons of this company from the tables Company_Coupon, Coupon - Can't get company if the company NOT found
      - Can't get company if the system shut down
      Coupon CompanyFacade.getCoupon(long id)
      Get coupon from the table Coupon - Can't get coupon if the coupon NOT found
      - Can't get coupon if the system shut down

      Get the valid coupons by end date of the current company from the tables Company_Coupon, Coupon - Can't get the coupons if the system shut down

      CouponClientFacade CustomerFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, ClientType clientType)
      Login to the system as a customer, search name and password in the table Customer - Can't login to the system if the system shut down
      CouponClientFacade CouponClientFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, ClientType clientType)

      CouponClientFacade CompanyFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, ClientType clientType)

      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Insert the id of the customer who purchased this coupon and the id of this coupon to the table Customer_Coupon - Can't purchase coupon if the coupon NOT found
      - Can't purchase coupon if the coupon expired
      - Can't purchase coupon if the current customer already purchased the coupon
      - Can't purchase coupon if the coupon out of stock
      - Can't purchase coupon if the system shut down
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(Company company)
      Delete company from the table Company and delete all of the valid coupons of this company from the tables Coupon, Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon - Can't delete company if the company NOT found
      - Can't delete company if the system shut down
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Delete coupon from the table Coupon and delete the id of this coupon from the tables Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon - Can't delete coupon if the coupon NOT found
      - Can't delete coupon if the system shut down
      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Delete customer from the table Customer and delete all of the coupons of this customer from the table Customer_Coupon - Can't delete customer if the customer NOT found
      - Can't delete customer if the system shut down
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company company)
      Update company in the table Company - Can't update company if the company NOT found
      - Can't update company if the name changed
      - Can't update company if the system shut down
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Update coupon in the table Coupon - Can't update coupon if the coupon NOT found
      - Can update only the end date and the price
      - Can't update coupon if the system shut down
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Update customer in the table Customer - Can't update customer if the customer NOT found
      - Can't update customer if the name changed
      - Can't update customer if the system shut down
